author: David Ramos
description: A well balanced fortified salad in a glass - almost healthy.
name: Cucumber & Mint Martini
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber and mint in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
